page.title: 14Wivelsfield - Home Life
page.content:
{***** My Day by Emma aged 10. *****
Dad and Paul get up at 6.30 am.They have breakfast and Paul sorts the papers for his paper round. Dad goes to the station after waking Mum up with a cup of tea. I go downstairs to say hello to the dog and cat and to have breakfast.I listen to the radio while I get dressed and at 8.35 am I go to school.We start at 9.00 am with the register and then lessons with 15 minutes for play-time. We have 30 minutes for lunch at school then 30 minutes to play. At 1.00 pm we go back to the classroom to do some work on our topic, which this term is the 'Domesday Project'.After this we have 30 minutes of P.E. before we go home at 3.15 pm. We have tea at about 7.30 pm when Dad comes home, wash up then watch television until bedtime.
